gw.plugin.credentials

Class CredentialsPlugin

  • gw.plugin.credentials.CredentialsPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class CredentialsPlugin
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    This class serves as a simple pluggable interface to allow a username/password pair corresponding to some key to be retrieved in some manner defined by the user, such as retrieving them from an external system, decrypting the password, reading a file from the filesystem, and so on.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UsernamePasswordPairBase retrieveUsernameAndPassword(String key)
      Return a username and password for the provided key.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveUsernameAndPassword

        UsernamePasswordPairBase retrieveUsernameAndPassword(String key)
        Return a username and password for the provided key.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the user/password pair for which authentication information is being requested. This key can be anything you want. It simply identifies which username/password pair you want.
        Returns:
        the username and password to use
